channel.title: IIM-Bangalore on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in IIM-Bangalore on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: It came to an end
item.description: Officially it is overâ€¦ ten month long journey came to an end. There were two exams and one submission before pulling the final curtain by November end. Before writing further I must thank Pamela for persuading me in enrolling in to this Executive MBA (EXMP) of IIM Bangalore. The course in nutshell covers almost all the areas of management and gives you enough foundation to build your own interest in specific area.
